divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cig after walking the dog around the block and something caught my eye as a flash over the roof and looked up and saw a large fireball or large meteor the largest I've ever seen moving very slowly very very bright white a hundred times brighter than Sirius and break up into many fragments and disappear dead overhead. Wondering if anyone saw a better view.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around April 30th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Large Fireball breaks up dead overhead from East.
